name: Carter Lake Campground
Current Conditions:
Campground open through September 30, 2018. 

Snowy Plover restrictions in place March 15 - September 15
Fees: Camping: $22 per night for single unit, two vehicle limitDay use: $5/Day/Vehicle
Information Center: Oregon Dunes National Recreation Area Visitor Center
Reservations: Reserve online at www.recreation.gov or phone 877.444.6777.
